name: @odmd-rag/embedding-service
description: RAG Embedding Service - Generates embeddings from processed document chunks

scripts.build:handlers: cd lib/handlers && npm install && npm run build
scripts.ragEmbedding-cdk-ls: tsc --build && cross-env ODMD_build_id=ragEmbedding ODMD_rev_ref=b..dev cdk ls --profile default
scripts.ragEmbedding-cdk-ls-deps: tsc --build && cross-env ODMD_build_id=ragEmbedding ODMD_rev_ref=b..dev cdk ls --show-dependencies --profile default
scripts.ragEmbedding-cdk-synth: tsc --build && cross-env ODMD_build_id=ragEmbedding ODMD_rev_ref=b..dev cdk synth --all --profile default

author: ODMD RAG Team
